actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing.

official_title: A bill to amend the Flood Disaster Protection Act of 1973 to make compliance with its provisions voluntary.

summary.text: Makes compliance with the provisions of the Flood Disaster Protection Act voluntary. Provides for procedures for calling to the attention of the Secretary of the Department of Health, Education, and Welfare the existence of flood hazards.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Flood Disaster Protection Act of 1973 to make compliance with its provisions voluntary.
